content:
Do you know of any hospitals that are currently using CDS Hooks either as a pilot or in actual production mode?

This is one where I might see if others in the community want to chime in. But based on participation in one of the CDS Hooks-related Argonaut projects from 2019, we've had participation from a number of organizations. Specifically @Julie Winters @Travis Pittman @Isaac Vetter @Dennis Patterson @Chuck Feltner @Alex Tatiyants might be able to comment on where/how CDS Hooks is emerging (pilots and/or production).
(And of course, others -- that's only a small subset of project participants.)

We would definitely appreciate any project participants who want to share any successes/challenges you have experienced with piloting CDS Hooks at a specific organization. This would be an interesting aspect to incorporate into our paper!
@Phillip Warner @Kensaku Kawamoto @Patrick Murta?
